context.title: The First Academic Committee
context.content:
Membership of the Academic Committee

 

Professor Ming FANG, China National Radio (CNR).
Professor Zhiwei FENG, a research fellow at the Institute of Applied Linguistics, Ministry of Education (IAL-MOE), and a member of the Academic Committee of IAL-MOE.
Professor Changning HUANG, Microsoft Research Asia.
Delong JIN, the State Administration of Radio Film and Television.
Professor Xiaohua LI, Dean of the Graduate School at Communication University of China.
Professor Jingchao LU, Dean of Presentation Art School at Communication University of China.
Professor Jianming LU, Dept. of Chinese Language and Literature at Peking University.
Jing LUO, China Central Television (CCTV).
Professor Yukun MA, Presentation Art School at Communication University of China.
Professor Jiaxuan SHEN, Institute of Linguistics, Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.
Liang WANG, Beijing Radio Corporation (RBC).
Professor Xishuang YAO, Institute of Applied Linguistics, Ministry of Education (IAL-MOE).
Professor Shiwen YU, Institute of Computational Linguistics at Peking University.
Professor Pu ZHANG, Institute of Applied Linguistics at Beijing Language and Culture University.
Professor Song ZHANG, Presentation Art School at Communication University of China.

 


Co-director of Academic Committee

 

Professor Yuming LI, Director of Administration Dept. of Chinese Language and Information in Ministry of Education.
Professor Zhiwu SU, President of Communication University of China.
